Type.Name: FileFilter

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileFilter extends GLib.InitiallyUnowned

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: This class sets up a filter to include or exclude particular kinds of files; useful in file selection dialogs.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new file filter with no rules attached to it.
Docs.remarks: A newly-created filter doesn't accept any files, so is not particularly useful until you add rules with , , or .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(native int raw) cil managed
public void AddCustom (Gtk.FileFilterFlags needed, Gtk.FileFilterFunc func);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddCustom(valuetype Gtk.FileFilterFlags needed, class Gtk.FileFilterFunc func) cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds a rule to a filter that allows files based on a custom callback function.
Docs.remarks: The bitfield which is passed in provides information about what sorts of information that the filter function needs; this allows GTK+ to avoid retrieving expensive information when it isn't needed by the filter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddMimeType(string mime_type) cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds a rule allowing a given MIME type to a filter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddPattern(string pattern) cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds a rule allowing a shell style glob to a filter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddPixbufFormats() cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance bool Filter(valuetype Gtk.FileFilterInfo filter_info) cil managed

Docs.summary: Tests whether a file should be displayed according to this filter.
Docs.returns: a , TRUE if the file should be displayed.
Docs.remarks: The structure should include the fields returned from . This function will not typically be used by applications; it is intended principally for use in the implementation of .

Docs.summary: The human-readable name of the filter.
Docs.remarks: This is the string that will be displayed in the file selector user interface if there is a selectable list of filters.

Docs.summary: Gets the fields that need to be filled in for the structure passed to .
Docs.value: a , flags that list the needed fields when calling .
Docs.remarks: This function will not typically be used by applications; it is intended principally for use in the implementation of .
